# Hi, I'm Daniel Eurien.
I am an Epidemiologist and Data Scientist passionate about integrating data science into public health and small-to-medium enterprises to drive profitability. I love data visualization, machine learning, and applying natural language processing in business intelligence. Through this blog, I share my impactful public good projects using my newly acquired skills.

To get started, you can check out my most popular content below. You can find me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DEurien) or
[GitHub](https://github.com/euriendd) and 
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-eurien-539a0965/). 
Feel free to reach out to me via [mail](mailto:euriend56@gmail.com) and subscribe to my email newsletter.
